name: most-gestures
description: unified desktop/mobile high level pointer gestures, using most.js

scripts.release-patch: git checkout master; npm version patch ; git push origin master --tags
scripts.release-minor: git checkout master; npm version minor ; git push origin master --tags
scripts.release-major: git checkout master; npm version major ; git push origin master --tags

author: Mark 'kaosat-dev' Moissette
